txt.en: 'Our scouts learned that there is a potent Uruk War-leader in the ruins. We believe that if we can remove it quickly, we have a chance to undermine the efforts of these invaders from the south. If you are willing, we ask you to make your way into the camp, find the leader, and remove it. Mayhap, in their absence, we can strike a harder blow and drive the remaining Uruks from the land.'
Complete the Mission: Bite the Hand
Speak with the mission giver and travel to the location of the Uruk encampment and defeat the war-leader there.
White Hand Uruks encamped within Elven ruins threaten the populace with great weapons of war. Scouts present an option to strike down the leader and throw the forces gathered into disarray.
There is no twist in this mission.
'Strike quickly and remove their leader. We shall yet drive this foe from our lands. I will await your triumphant return.'
Return to the mission giver and let them know of your victory over the White Hand.
'Your effort to defeat the White Hand will not go unrewarded. This foe is great and you have proven yourself a worthy defender of the Free Folk. Please, accept this small token of our thanks.'
